程序包 org.texttechnology.parliament_browser_6_4.helper

类 MongoDBConnectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.texttechnology.parliament_browser_6_4.helper.MongoDBConnectionHandler
  • public class MongoDBConnectionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles connections to MongoDB, including initializing the connection with specified configuration, accessing collections, and fetching documents from the database.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      MongoDBConnectionHandler​(MongoDBConfig pConfig)
      Constructs a new MongoDBConnectionHandler with the specified configuration, and initializes the connection to MongoDB.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MongoDBConnectionHandler

        public MongoDBConnectionHandler​(MongoDBConfig pConfig)
        Constructs a new MongoDBConnectionHandler with the specified configuration, and initializes the connection to MongoDB.
        参数:
        pConfig - The MongoDB configuration to use for connecting to the database.

        参数:

        返回:

      • getObject

        public org.bson.Document getObject​(java.lang.String sID,
                                   java.lang.String sCollection)
        Retrieves a document object by its ID from the specified collection.
        参数:
        sID - The ID of the document to retrieve.
        sCollection - The name of the collection to search in.
        返回:
        The found Document, or null if no document matches the given ID.

      • getDatabase

        public com.mongodb.client.MongoDatabase getDatabase()
        Returns the database object for the currently selected MongoDB database.
        返回:
        The current MongoDatabase.

        参数:
